Comments_List:
- learned how to better critically read papers
- learned a lot about the biochemical backgrounds of the clinical diseases we learned in class
How to think like a scientist.
Enjoyed reading papers that connected with med school, enjoyed the interactiveness, wish it be continued the entire year

strengths:
- I loved having Dr. Baserga as my discussion group leader. She added a lot of insight to the discussions and asked the important questions
- I really enjoyed all of the topics that we had

weaknesses:
- sometimes we got really off tangent
- there were times when smaller discussions distracted from the greater discussion that was happening

I actually enjoyed some of the days where every student was required to speak because it felt a lot more engaging. I think more students were encouraged to participate the class would be even greater.
Yes, the course helped me develop a framework for diving into research related to a variety of medical topics in sync with class topics.
